description.value:
When you learn this ability, the following Mantras are added to your list of available Mantras to choose from.  However, these Mantras can only be associated with your Number of Order.  

In addition, when this is unlocked, you can swap out 1 Mantra you know for another one.  

  • Justice Never Rests: You gain an extra Reaction until the start of your next turn.
